code: import{createSlice}from"@reduxjs/toolkit";var initialState={isSidebarOn:false};var sidebarSlice=createSlice({name:'sidebar',initialState:initialState,reducers:{setSidebarOn:function setSidebarOn(state){state.isSidebarOn=true;},setSidebarOff:function setSidebarOff(state){state.isSidebarOn=false;}}});var _sidebarSlice$actions=sidebarSlice.actions,setSidebarOn=_sidebarSlice$actions.setSidebarOn,setSidebarOff=_sidebarSlice$actions.setSidebarOff;export{setSidebarOn,setSidebarOff};export var getSidebarStatus=function getSidebarStatus(state){return state.sidebar.isSidebarOn;};export default sidebarSlice.reducer;
